entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 1:36PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snowmelt Flooding Possible Later This Week... All areas of Northern Alaska will see a warming trend to near or just above normal temperatures in the second half of this week. entry.title: Flood Advisory issued May 06 at 9:54PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST/6 PM MDT/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding on Chinle Wash caused by snowmelt in the Chuska Mountains will continue through Monday. entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 07 at 1:27PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High River Flows and Flooding due to Snowmelt... Despite cooler temperatures since Thursday, rivers and streams are expected to continue running high as warm temperatures have melted much of the valley and foothills snowpack, which is making its way into the main stem rivers.
